FundingAward.name: FundingAward
FundingAward.description: Represents an award given to an individual or organization to facilitate a goal related to the funderâ€™s mission.

AwardNumber.description: The unique identifier of the funding award in the customer's org.

AwardeeId.description: The entity related to the funding award. The account can be an organization or individual that receives the funding.

BudgetId.description: The budget that's used to track the use of the award funding.

ContactId.description: The individual receiving the funding award.

DecisionDate.description: The date and time of the decision about the funding award.

EndDate.description: The date and time when the contract related to the award ends.

FundingOpportunityId.description: The funding opportunity that's associated with the award.

IndividualApplicationId.description: The individual application that's related to the award.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the funding award.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

ParentFundingAwardId.description: The parent funding award for this amendment.

StartDate.description: The date and time when the contract related to the award begins.

Status.description: Specifies the current status of the award.
